name: Lemon Sour Cream Cookies
author: Emily's Delicious Delectables
summary: Sour cream cookies with a lemon twist. These are a big hit in my family and I hope they will be as well in yours. These cookies are similar to miniature cakes. Delish!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl
Cream butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed
Gradually add sugar and beat until light and fluffy
Beat in sour cream, lemon zest, vanilla extract, and lemon extract
Reduce speed to low; beat in dry ingredients just until blended
Drop tablespoonfuls of dough on the prepared cookie sheets, spacing them 1 inch apart
Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are set and edges are golden, 10 to 12 minutes
Use a wide metal spatula to transfer the cookies to wire racks to cool completely
